snippet.title: What’s New in the Exclusive Demo: In-Depth Guide by Jotunnslayer | Hordes of Hel - Dev Diaries #3
snippet.description:
Join Hordes of Hel Lead Game Designer Peter Hornak in the latest episode of Into Hel: Dev Diaries! In this special, in-depth guide, Jotunnslayer takes us through all the exciting new features available in the exclusive demo, including a closer look at the newly introduced hero, Revenant, and the mighty God Loki.

Get behind-the-scenes insights on the design intentions driving these new additions and discover how your feedback has directly influenced the player experience. 

Don’t miss out—play the demo now and see these updates firsthand:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3047240/Jotunnslayer_Hordes_of_Hel_Demo/

Chapters 

00:00 Intro 
00:43 New Class: Revenant 
02:17 Loki 
03:21 New Objectives 
03:56 UI/UX Overhaul 
04:39 Other Improvements 
05:28 Outro
